about_the_game:
Explore a Vast and Beautiful Universe:

Step into a breathtaking open-world environment filled with diverse landscapes, from lush forests to unforgiving deserts. But what truly sets RTE Worlds apart is the ever-evolving universe. Thanks to our groundbreaking procedural-generation technology, you'll never run out of new places to explore. Every corner of the world is a fresh adventure waiting to be discovered.

The story

In the wake of a devastating alien invasion that left Earth in ruins, you awaken from cryo-sleep 50 years later, a lone survivor in a world forever changed. Deep within the heart of this post-apocalyptic wasteland lies a vital piece of the puzzle – the lost launch code for a nuclear ICBM capable of taking down the colossal alien motherships that continue to dominate the skies. Will you rise to the challenge, unearth the launch code, and lead humanity to victory, or will Earth remain under the shadow of alien domination? The future of our world is in your hands.

Procedurally Generated World & Dungeons:

Embark on a never-ending journey across a world that's uniquely crafted each time you play. Explore vast landscapes up to 2500 Km2 in size and conquer the ever-changing challenges of randomly generated dungeons, ensuring no two adventures are alike.

Base Building Made Easy:

Construct your dream refuge without the hassle of tedious grinds. In RTE Worlds, create and customize your base effortlessly, allowing your creativity to flow freely. Build, design, and defend your haven with ease.

RPG Elements

Evolve Your Character: Immerse yourself in rich RPG elements with a dynamic skill tree and weapon proficiency system. Tailor your character's abilities, specialize in your chosen skills, and forge a unique path to greatness. Watch as your character grows and transforms, becoming a true survivor in the unforgiving world of RTE Worlds.

Conquer the Infected Zone's Menace:

In RTE Worlds, you'll face an ultimate challenge within the perilous Infected Zone. Battle formidable bosses that guard the heart of darkness, each with their unique powers and tactics. Team up with allies or go it alone, but be prepared for an epic showdown where only the bravest will emerge victorious. Are you up for the ultimate test of survival and skill?

Endless Adventures Await:

Embark on thrilling quests and engaging side missions that will challenge your wits and skills. What sets RTE Worlds apart is the ever-renewing world of side quests, randomly generated each time you play. Every journey offers new opportunities, ensuring no two adventures are alike. Prepare for endless excitement and discovery

Survive the Elements:

In RTE Worlds, the world's temperature is more than just a number. It's a dynamic force that shapes your character's experience. Extreme heat and bone-chilling cold will test your resilience, affecting your stamina, health, and survival strategies. Adapt or perish in this ever-changing world where the elements are your most formidable adversary.

The sanity system:

Your sanity is key to your survival, if your sanity drops, all regenerations will stop, max stamina will be slashed in half, and max carry weight will be slashed in half. To increase your sanity, you can sleep in good beds, drink alcohol, and be around furniture or campfires. Being around other players will slow sanity decay, so teaming up with other players has never been so beneficial.

Dare to Enter the Abyss:

In RTE Worlds, mysterious Dark Infected Zones beckon the fearless. Equipped with specialized masks, few have ventured into these perilous domains, and none have returned unchanged. Enter at your own risk! These eerie zones are cloaked by seemingly tranquil and vibrant barriers, masking the horrors that lie within. Will you pierce the colorful facade to unveil the abyss, or will you heed the ominous warnings and seek safer pastures?

Soar and Swing with Style:

Explore RTE Worlds like never before by taking to the skies with gliders and navigating rugged terrain with grappling hooks. Traverse vast landscapes with grace and precision, utilizing these exhilarating tools to access hidden treasures and conquer challenging landscapes. The sky's the limit as you blaze your own path through this dynamic world.

Expect the Unexpected in RTE Worlds:

Step into a living world where surprises lurk around every corner. Brace yourself for the unexpected, from alien dropships to meteor showers, colossal hordes, raging tornadoes, and deadly fog. In this dynamic realm, anything can happen at any moment. Survival requires adaptability, wits, and a readiness for whatever challenges fate may throw your way.

Join our development discord to follow up on the development

name: RTE Worlds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB VRam
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sounds card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: I7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2080 ti or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sounds card

short_description: Dive into a thrilling multiplayer survival adventure in RTE Worlds. With a procedurally generated world, random dungeons, and limitless replayability. Explore by land, sea, air, and immerse yourself in a captivating story brimming with quests and unforgettable NPCs. Your epic journey begins here!
